title: Meet the Kinda Funny Review Scale
description:
Here's our new scale:
5 - AMAZING
4 - GREAT
3 - OK
2 - BAD
1 - TERRIBLE

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Get The Shows Ad-Free On Patreon: 
Kinda Funny http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 
Kinda Funny Games http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames

Buy Some Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Follow Us On Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

transcript_chunks.text: kind of funny is defining how it reviews games movies and everything else under the entertainment sun we've been kicking around a review scale in the gamescast and now we've nailed it down starting with horizon forbidden west rolling into the peacemaker finale and then getting applied to everything we review going forward we're gonna be using the patented five-point kind of funny scale a five is amazing a four is great a three is okay a two is bad and a one is terrible no we're not trying to get on metacritic or get you to scroll to the end of a video to see a number we just want a unified shareable shorthand that sums up how we feel about something we just spent an hour and a half talking about we want to be in naibal's review roundup tweets and the reset error threads so that people know we're reviewing the day's hot topic these words and numbers are just billboards for the content we're creating nothing changes about the show you're watching you just get to watch us squirm and try

we're reviewing the day's hot topic these words and numbers are just billboards for the content we're creating nothing changes about the show you're watching you just get to watch us squirm and try to figure out what adjective best sums up our experience fun i guess
